name: In need of Gasoline
description:
Controlls:

W-A-S-D : Movement | Space  : Jump | Left Mouse Click : Shoot | R : Reload

After some time traveling you are stranded in front of a town because your gasolin ran out. Now is it time to scavange the town for some gas and bring it back to your car. But be preparet there are Zombies around.

Note: I made this game solo in 7 days. So sorry for bugs and other issues.If you have some advice pls concider to write a comment.
